title: Tobira: Gateway to Advanced Japanese (Textbook + Kanji Workbook)
description:
Hello again!

This torrent contains "Tobira: Gateway to Advanced Japanese" (2009) and "Tobira: Power Up Your Kanji" (2010).  These are fantastic books and I hope you enjoy them as much as I have!

"TOBIRA is a groundbreaking intermediate-level Japanese textbook designed to develop the four language skills through the study of a variety of different topics from Japanese geography and history to pop culture. TOBIRA promotes language learning through the use of multimedia materials and establishes a support system via the Internet so that learners outside Japan have access to a Japanese language environment." - Publisher

This torrent does not contain "Grammar Power" or "Teaching Intermediate Japanese", so if you have them please share!
